universum.studios.android.ui.widget

Class GraphicsInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.ui.widget.GraphicsInfo
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColorGraphicsInfo, TextGraphicsInfo

    public abstract class GraphicsInfo
extends Object
    Base class that can be used to hold parameters that are needed to draw a specific graphics of a specific widget.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Paint paint
      Paint used to draw graphics associated with this info.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GraphicsInfo()
      Same as GraphicsInfo(Paint) with default paint with Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG.
      GraphicsInfo(Paint paint)
      Creates a new instance of GraphicsInfo with the specified paint.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract boolean updatePaint(int[] stateSet)
      Updates this info's paint with settings hold by this info according to the specified stateSet.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • paint

        public final Paint paint
        Paint used to draw graphics associated with this info.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GraphicsInfo

        public GraphicsInfo()
        Same as GraphicsInfo(Paint) with default paint with Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG.

      • GraphicsInfo

        public GraphicsInfo(@NonNull
                    Paint paint)
        Creates a new instance of GraphicsInfo with the specified paint.
        Parameters:
        paint - Paint to be used to draw graphics of which parameters will be hold by this info.

    • Method Detail

      • updatePaint

        public abstract boolean updatePaint(@Nullable
                                    int[] stateSet)
        Updates this info's paint with settings hold by this info according to the specified stateSet.
        Parameters:
        stateSet - The state for which to update the paint.
        Returns:
        True if some setting of the paint has been changed, false otherwise.
